snippet: The United States women's soccer team will play Japan in a rematch of last year's World Cup final, and Usain Bolt of Jamaica looks to win his second gold of these Games. Soccer reporter Sam Borden joins Victor Mather in London to preview the women's...
abstract: The United States women's soccer team will play Japan in a rematch of last year's World Cup final, and Usain Bolt of Jamaica looks to win his second gold of these Games. Soccer reporter Sam Borden joins Victor Mather in London to preview the women's final.

headline.main: What We're Watching: U.S. Soccer Seeking Revenge, and Gold

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
